tweet: The IOTA 1.5 network upgrade is approaching! With it, #Firefly will become #IOTA's new wallet. The result of over 3 years of learning, with next-level security, an improved user experience & an expandable app architecture.  https://t.co/HSUubfnspZ

The new #Firefly Wallet for #IOTA looks absolutely stunning! ❤️. It really sets a new benchmark with its focus on ease of use and its secure architecture. Payments, Accounts, Contacts, Chat, Device Control and more - all will be available within one app. Beta Testing starts Dec.  https://t.co/c0z1GG67lj

The new high-level API that we're implementing in our #IOTA client libs for #Chrysalis phase 2 (IOTA 1.5 network upgrade) will be great. Will remove many of the protocol complexities and will make building on and maintaining projects built on IOTA easier than ever!
Today we have a special live session with our #Bee team! Thibault Martinez will demonstrate Bee on a #testnet. Join us at 5PM CET.  https://t.co/Hp90o1vH0v #IOTA #rustlang

Are you a #SoftwareEngineer #rustlang interested in the latest technologies? Do you want to help us build the next generation of distributed technologies #IOTA? Join our team! All details at  https://t.co/pKeegNrk5E #IOTAJobs  https://t.co/tFcTSysHf2
"This is a dramatic situation," says @MiguelWFP in #Honduras.  Here's how we're helping those affected by the hurricanes #Iota and #Eta 👇  https://t.co/gtXc93iG77

Let's not forget what happened with the hurricanes in November.  #Eta became the strongest Atlantic #hurricane on record to make landfall in Nicaragua in November (Cat. 4, 140 mph winds).    #Iota then reached cat 5 only 2 weeks later and slammed the same communities (as cat 4).  https://t.co/Ii26p8Kwzp

The IOTA 1.5 network upgrade is approaching! With it, #Firefly will become #IOTA's new wallet. The result of over 3 years of learning, with next-level security, an improved user experience & an expandable app architecture.  https://t.co/XGD0FjH4ch

Everyone should try #IOTA Selv demo!  The internet will change with self sovereign identities! No bots, more trust and much easier to log into different pages. Sharing personal datas and credentials, improving KYC processes... Can't wait for it! @JelleFm   https://t.co/iyXqCv49XG
